briefTitle: Safety Study of Lifitegrast to Treat Dry Eye
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Masked and Placebo-Controlled Study Evaluating the Safety of a 5.0% Concentration of Lifitegrast Ophthalmic Solution Compared to Placebo in Subjects With Dry Eye (SONATA)
summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety of lifitegrast ophthalmic solution compared to placebo in the treatment of dry eye as assessed by ocular and non-ocular adverse events when administered BID for approximately 1 year.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Ocular and Nonocular Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) for 1 Year
